Я всем рекомендую эту игру. Кто не играл обязательно должны попробовать поиграть. Потому что игра реально очень классная. Мне в этой игре понравился сюжет. Для меня это одна из самых лучших сюжетных игр. ОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНО СКАЧАЙТЕ И ПОИГРАЙТЕ В ЭТУ ИГРУ. ИГРА ПРОСТО ШЕДЕВР!!!

在HL之前，射击游戏是没有任何剧情的；在HL之前，玩家是无法与FPS里面的环境物品进行交互的；在HL之后，脚本的使用使得游戏进程中也可以无缝出现剧情了；在HL之后，游戏通关的方式不再只有击杀所有敌人这一种选择。如果没有HL，就不会有CS；如果没有HL，也许就不会有steam平台；如果没有HL，也就不会有source引擎；如果没有HL，我们现在会在玩什么？但是幸好，没有如果。
9.8/10

Love this game.  My dad played it back when it came out and getting to play it now is like a blast to the past!  Still a great game even after all these years.;

I mean, it's not perfect. Hell, the movement is slidey, the enemies are either idiots or omniscient, and i had to reload a save 20 times. But I liked it, and it's fun to see where we came from. It's well done.
Amazing ass game. Lives well up to the hype.

Well, look. It's over 20 years old and it's still a great game. Sure, it's a little screwy when it comes to movement, some of the platforming doesn't quite work, and some parts are frankly super fucking tedious by today's standards. Actually, they might have been a bit tedious by 1998 standards too - Nihilanth is the worst boss ever, some bits are really janky, and around hour 8 of that playthrough I started to want it to be over. But overall it's forgivable.

You know, because it's over 20 years old, and some of the stuff the original Half-Life on the GoldSrc engine got right, later games couldn't. Is it better than the original Doom or Quake? Perhaps not in the ways that Doom and Quake excelled at. It's maybe not as atmospheric as Doom or as precise as Quake. But it's got a great feel to it, so much so that when I replayed it this time it didn't take long for me to know that this was still a great game. Despite its faults, it's a better game overall than Quake - even though Quake is superb, Half-Life is just a step above it.

And it's still getting updates! Overall you'll probably have a more fun time with Half-Life: Source, but getting this would be more than just a nostalgia kick. It'll actually be fun.
Fun puzzles, good story, good physics, passable combat, good graphics. THE game.
Half life was super good but old. Graphics sucks and the plot was questionable but still super enjoyable

Recuerdo que conoci Half-Life de la misma manera que conoci Counter-Strike, en un Cyber y me enamore al instante, siempre lo jugue en LAN con amigos y jamas logre terminar la campaña por no darle mucha bola, ahora si, despues de 9hs de historia logro entender lo que cautivo a tantas personas en 1998, este juego es un FPS puro, al igual que las competencias de su epoca DOOM & QUAKE, la verdad que Half-Life es una obra maestra tanto a nivel mecanico e historia, y espero que siempre lo sea.
If PC had one game to its name. It would be half-life.

If you haven't heard of Half Life, then where have you been , I assume living in a cave, welcome back.
It's the game that encouraged Valve to create Steam , it's a game that showed the world what could be achieved with MODS and it was and still is brilliant.
It's a bit of an oldie but has it aged well, is it a good wine or a mouldy cheese ?
It's definately a good wine , yes it doesn't look as pretty but the game is still their , all the bits that made it amazing are still there and  it's still a great example of story telling but it does this without cut scenes and yet it still tells a great story.
It set the stage for the modern age of story telling through game , it features in most top 10 best games of all time list and it deserves it.
I am one of those rare people who prefers the sequel but only because it's prettier and only by a cat's whisker.
If you love games that are based around story telling with an endless amount of MODS that keep adding , then this is the game for you.
When it came out , I would of given it a 9.5 score and even now, it would still have to be a 8.5.
Often copied and rarely bettered,
Aunque se un poco viejo es uno de los mejores con buena historia
